issue.title: [R] Clean up in/by Arrow messaging
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13362](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13362). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Harmonise the wording in `arrow_not_supported` with it's "not supported by Arrow" and the "not supported in Arrow" phrasing used elsewhere.

ARROW-12964 added both to the regex in `expect_dplyr_equal`, but we should be consistent everywhere.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13362?focusedCommentId=17438740) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11502
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11502>
